fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Overpower a player, killing them
-Fire your doomsday beam

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If this role spawns, reroll someone else into Protagonist (3746)
-Everyone knows you are the Antagonist, and you cannot be killed by anyone until all your minions are killed
-You cannot fire the doomsday beam until day X, where X is the amount of Minion players and you + 2
-Firing the doomsday beam wins the game for all Minions as well as you
-You have a private night chat with everyone who is defined as a Minion
-Your minions will all gain a one use ability called “Suppress the Weak” which can only be used if all Minions use it on the same night. If successfully used when the town successfully uses “Form a Mob”, then your side will instead kill 3 Non-minion players and bring the doomsday beam timer down by 1 day
-Minions will only be able to win if you win

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Fire the doomsday beam!
Note for both roles: Everyone will still receive a role as normal and can perform night actions
